content.prompt: According to the study, which of the following is true?

choices.label: More young people prefer handwritten letters.
Young people do not have a preference.
Most people find typed letters easier to read.
Sixty percent of people say they do not write letters.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
